title: SC EP:47 Screaming Sasquatch! I was run out of camp!
itunes:title: SC EP:47 Screaming Sasquatch! I was run out of camp!
description: This is your bonus show for the holiday weekend! Tonight we speak to Matt from Colorado. Mike tells us about an encounter he had while camping. Mike and his friend were terrorized by a group of Sasquatches while camping in the Rockies. This is the first time Mike has ever shared this story with the public.
